That was sweet.

I love drawing a lot as a kid.
This movie makes me think of my

Do you remember what you liked to do

Yes, I remember it clearly.
My childhood was full of noise and

After school, I drew animals, houses,

My notebooks were full of pictures. Our

When I saw them again later, I felt very

When I was a child, I loved riding my

We always rode until it was dark.
>> You probably fell many times, didn't

>> Yes. My knees were often hurt, but I

I also played soccer with the boys in my

You were very brave. I didn't like going

I often stayed at home to listen to my

What stories did she tell you?
Stories about her life.
Sometimes they were sad, sometimes they

I loved her voice. Our childhoods were
different, but both were beautiful.
Yes, even now when I feel tired, I still
like to draw. It helped me remember that
simple time. Childhood is over, but the
memories stay.
The dentist had to remove it.
Hey, Jack. What happened to your face?
It looks swollen.
Yeah, I had a terrible toothache last

Yes. Yesterday evening, my tooth started

Around 10:00, my mom took me to an

That must have been scary.
>> I was very scared. The dentist checked

It pushed against the other teeth. So,

Did it hurt a lot? Not too much at that

I couldn't feel anything for hours.
No wonder you talked like that today.
This morning, my face became swollen.
I looked in the mirror and almost didn't

You should have stayed at home and

After class, you should go home and

Sometimes they even had holes.
Really? What did you do then?
>> I felt sad sometimes when I saw my

>> That must have been difficult.
>> Yes, but it also taught me something

what I had.
>> I never thought about that before. I

>> Now our life is better. I am happy
because I can buy you the shoes you
like.
>> Thank you, Mom. I promise I will take

>> That is enough for me. Nice shoes are

confident
because our teacher always encouraged

>> I almost wanted to give up, but the

Yes, I studied every night after that.

>> We stayed up late and drank cheap

We worried about exams together and

Me too. Life has changed a lot, but

forever.

So, you starved my kid to prove a point?
No, I'm trying to help him eat

He's eight. He's not on a diet. I don't

Are you eating mac and cheese again?
Yep. Do you want a bite? No thanks. I

There's parsley on top. That's just for

That sounds sad.
It's good for you, though. So is being

Knowing I won't kick the bucket at 40.
You say that, but have you ever had a

You're comparing apples to oranges. At

At least my food doesn't taste like
sadness.
Healthy food can taste good.
Not like this mac and cheese. It won't.
You're hopeless.
You're missing out on a whole
